author: Mike Cole
title: Watch Red Sox’s Spring Training Opener Vs. Northeastern Online (Live Stream) | Live Stream | NESN.com
text:
by Mike Cole on Thu, Feb 23, 2017 at 1:11PM 15,818 Tweet 
The Boston Red Sox are playing baseball, and you can watch it online. 
The Sox’s spring training opener is Thursday, and the matinee versus Northeastern from JetBlue Park is being streamed on MLB’s Facebook page. 
See it below.
